traits.name: Hive Mind
entries: All fiendish formians within 1 mile of Ekengarik can telepathically communicate with each other and Ekengarik.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The fiendish formian makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target's Strength score is reduced by 1. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
